name: NATIONAL GUARD ASSOCIATION OF THE UNITED STATES
description: NGAUS is the association for the current and former members of the Army and Air Guard.
sampleDescriptions: Advising and advocating on issues related to budgets, appropriations, readiness, and organization.
Defense readiness, personnel, equipment, and budgetary policies related to the Army and Air National Guard.
